thread.title: Worst hotel I've ever been!
thread.title_full: Worst hotel I've ever been! - Review of Marrakech Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marco S
title: Worst hotel I've ever been!
text:
The room was completely different from what advertised. Towels were often dirty, I had to buy my own soap, often towels or toilet paper were missing and I had to ask for it.
After I saw the room I only wanted my money back and find another place. The staff was incompetent and I never managed to talk to a manager or get my money back.
I could go on complaining but to summarize I'd rather go to a decent hostel rather than this place.
Room Tip: avoid this place! See more room tips
